trans-unit.source: Accesses the cryptography configuration information.
trans-unit.target: 访问加密配置信息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the simple names recognized by this class and the default algorithm implementations to which they map.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了识别此类以及它们映射到的默认算法实现的简单名称。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can map other implementations to these names, as described in [Mapping Algorithm Names to Cryptography Classes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 或者，这些名称映射其他实现中, 所述[将算法名称映射到加密类](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: |Simple name|Algorithm implementation| |-----------------|------------------------------| |3DES, Triple DES, TripleDES, System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDESCryptoServiceProvider>| |AES, System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesCryptoServiceProvider>| |AesManaged, System.Security.Cryptography.AesManaged|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AesManaged>| |System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>| |DES, System.Security.Cryptography.DES|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DESCryptoServiceProvider>| |DSA, System.Security.Cryptography.DSA|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider>| |ECDH, ECDiffieHellman, ECDiffieHellmanCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanCng>| |ECDsa, ECDsaCng, System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsaCng>| |System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithm|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.SHA1CryptoServiceProvider>| |HMAC, System.Security.Cryptography.HMAC|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1>| |HMACMD5, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACMD5|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACMD5>| |HMACRIPEMD160, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACRIPEMD160|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACRIPEMD160>| |HMACSHA1, System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1|<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.HMACSHA1>| trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of names to algorithm mappings to be used for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 将一组名称添加到要用于当前的应用程序域的算法映射。

trans-unit.source: The specified mappings take precedence over the built-in mappings and the mappings in the machine.config file.
trans-unit.target: 指定的映射优先于内置的映射和 machine.config 文件中的映射。

trans-unit.source: The mappings are used to prevent partially trust code from using trusted cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: 映射用于防止部分信任代码使用受信任的加密操作。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm to map to.
trans-unit.target: 要映射到的算法。

trans-unit.source: An array of names to map to the algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 要将映射到算法的名称数组。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm or names parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The algorithm or names parameter is .

trans-unit.source: algorithm cannot be accessed from outside the assembly.
trans-unit.target: algorithm无法从外部访问程序集。

trans-unit.source: -or- One of the entries in the names parameter is empty or .
trans-unit.target: -之一中的条目names参数为空或 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a set of names to object identifier (OID) mappings to be used for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: 将一组名称添加到要用于当前的应用程序域的对象标识符 (OID) 映射。

trans-unit.source: The specified mappings take precedence over the built-in mappings and the mappings in the machine.config file.
trans-unit.target: 指定的映射优先于内置的映射和 machine.config 文件中的映射。

trans-unit.source: The mappings are used to prevent partially trust code from using trusted cryptographic operations.
trans-unit.target: 映射用于防止部分信任代码使用受信任的加密操作。

trans-unit.source: The object identifier (OID) to map to.
trans-unit.target: 对象标识符 (OID) 映射到中。

trans-unit.source: An array of names to map to the OID.
trans-unit.target: 要映射到该 OID 名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: The oid or names parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The oid or names parameter is .

trans-unit.source: One of the entries in the names parameter is empty or .
trans-unit.target: 中的条目之一 names 参数为空或 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the runtime should enforce the policy to create only Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) certified algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 指示运行时是否应强制执行策略以创建仅美国联邦信息处理标准 (FIPS) 认证算法的策略。

trans-unit.source: If `false`, any algorithm may be created.
trans-unit.target: 如果`false`，可能会创建任何算法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to enforce the policy; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要强制实施策略;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 创建指定的加密对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: For a list of simple names recognized by this class, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>.
trans-unit.target: 识别此类的简单名称的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the cryptographic object of which to create an instance.
trans-unit.target: 要创建实例的加密对象的简单名称。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 指定的加密对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The algorithm described by the name parameter was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.
trans-unit.target: 所描述的算法 name 参数在使用了美国联邦信息处理标准 (FIPS) 模式启用，但与 fips 不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified cryptographic object with the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的参数创建指定的加密对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: For a list of simple names recognized by this class, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>.
trans-unit.target: 识别此类的简单名称的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the cryptographic object of which to create an instance.
trans-unit.target: 要创建实例的加密对象的简单名称。

trans-unit.source: The arguments used to create the specified cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建指定的加密对象的参数。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the specified cryptographic object.
trans-unit.target: 指定的加密对象的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The algorithm described by the name parameter was used with Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) mode enabled, but is not FIPS compatible.
trans-unit.target: 所描述的算法 name 参数在使用了美国联邦信息处理标准 (FIPS) 模式启用，但与 fips 不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Encodes the specified object identifier (OID).
trans-unit.target: 编码指定的对象标识符 (OID)。

trans-unit.source: The OID to encode.
trans-unit.target: 要编码 OID。

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing the encoded OID.
trans-unit.target: 包含编码的 OID 的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The str parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The str parameter is .

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while encoding the OID.
trans-unit.target: OID 进行编码时出错。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object identifier (OID) of the algorithm corresponding to the specified simple name.
trans-unit.target: 获取与指定的简单名称对应的算法的对象标识符 (OID)。

trans-unit.source: For a list of simple names recognized by this class, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>.
trans-unit.target: 识别此类的简单名称的列表，请参阅<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.CryptoConfig>

trans-unit.source: The simple name of the algorithm for which to get the OID.
trans-unit.target: 要为其获取 OID 算法的简单名称。

trans-unit.source: The OID of the specified algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 指定的算法该 OID。

trans-unit.source: The name parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The name parameter is .
